english name is Bulbasaur. primary type is grass. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Overgrow. classification is Seed Pokémon. description is There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.

english name is Ivysaur. primary type is grass. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Overgrow. classification is Seed Pokémon. description is When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

english name is Venusaur. primary type is grass. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Overgrow. classification is Seed Pokémon. description is Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

english name is Charmander. primary type is fire. abilities 0 is Blaze. classification is Lizard Pokémon. description is It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

english name is Charmeleon. primary type is fire. abilities 0 is Blaze. classification is Flame Pokémon. description is It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

english name is Charizard. primary type is fire. secondary type is flying. abilities 0 is Blaze. classification is Flame Pokémon. description is It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

english name is Squirtle. primary type is water. abilities 0 is Torrent. classification is Tiny Turtle Pokémon. description is When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

english name is Wartortle. primary type is water. abilities 0 is Torrent. classification is Turtle Pokémon. description is It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.

english name is Blastoise. primary type is water. abilities 0 is Torrent. classification is Shellfish Pokémon. description is It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

english name is Caterpie. primary type is bug. abilities 0 is Shield Dust. classification is Worm Pokémon. description is For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.

english name is Metapod. primary type is bug. abilities 0 is Shed Skin. classification is Cocoon Pokémon. description is It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.

english name is Butterfree. primary type is bug. secondary type is flying. abilities 0 is Compoundeyes. classification is Butterfly Pokémon. description is In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

english name is Weedle. primary type is bug. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Shield Dust. classification is Hairy Pokémon. description is Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.

english name is Kakuna. primary type is bug. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Shed Skin. classification is Cocoon Pokémon. description is Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.

english name is Beedrill. primary type is bug. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Swarm. classification is Poison Bee Pokémon. description is It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

english name is Pidgey. primary type is normal. secondary type is flying. abilities 0 is Keen Eye. abilities 1 is Tangled Feet. classification is Tiny Bird Pokémon. description is Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.

english name is Pidgeotto. primary type is normal. secondary type is flying. abilities 0 is Keen Eye. abilities 1 is Tangled Feet. classification is Bird Pokémon. description is This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.

english name is Pidgeot. primary type is normal. secondary type is flying. abilities 0 is Keen Eye. abilities 1 is Tangled Feet. classification is Bird Pokémon. description is This Pokémon flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.

english name is Rattata. primary type is normal. secondary type is dark. abilities 0 is Run Away. abilities 1 is Guts. classification is Mouse Pokémon. description is Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you see one, you can be certain that 40 more live in the area.

english name is Raticate. primary type is normal. secondary type is dark. abilities 0 is Run Away. abilities 1 is Guts. classification is Mouse Pokémon. description is Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.

english name is Spearow. primary type is normal. secondary type is flying. abilities 0 is Keen Eye. classification is Tiny Bird Pokémon. description is Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.

english name is Fearow. primary type is normal. secondary type is flying. abilities 0 is Keen Eye. classification is Beak Pokémon. description is A Pokémon that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.

english name is Ekans. primary type is poison. abilities 0 is Intimidate. abilities 1 is Shed Skin. classification is Snake Pokémon. description is The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.

english name is Arbok. primary type is poison. abilities 0 is Intimidate. abilities 1 is Shed Skin. classification is Cobra Pokémon. description is The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.

english name is Pikachu. primary type is electric. abilities 0 is Static. classification is Mouse Pokémon. description is Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.

english name is Raichu. primary type is electric. secondary type is electric. abilities 0 is Static. abilities 1 is Surge Surfer (Alola Form). classification is Mouse Pokémon. description is Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.

english name is Sandshrew. primary type is ground. secondary type is ice. abilities 0 is Sand Veil. classification is Mouse Pokémon. description is It loves to bathe in the grit of dry, sandy areas. By sand bathing, the Pokémon rids itself of dirt and moisture clinging to its body.

english name is Sandslash. primary type is ground. secondary type is ice. abilities 0 is Sand Veil. classification is Mouse Pokémon. description is The drier the area Sandslash lives in, the harder and smoother the Pokémon’s spikes will feel when touched.

english name is Nidoran♀. primary type is poison. abilities 0 is Poison Point. abilities 1 is Rivalry. classification is Poison Pin Pokémon. description is Females are more sensitive to smells than males. While foraging, they’ll use their whiskers to check wind direction and stay downwind of predators.

english name is Nidorina. primary type is poison. abilities 0 is Poison Point. abilities 1 is Rivalry. classification is Poison Pin Pokémon. description is The horn on its head has atrophied. It’s thought that this happens so Nidorina’s children won’t get poked while their mother is feeding them.

english name is Nidoqueen. primary type is poison. secondary type is ground. abilities 0 is Poison Point. abilities 1 is Rivalry. classification is Drill Pokémon. description is Nidoqueen is better at defense than offense. With scales like armor, this Pokémon will shield its children from any kind of attack.

english name is Nidoran♂. primary type is poison. abilities 0 is Poison Point. abilities 1 is Rivalry. classification is Poison Pin Pokémon. description is The horn on a male Nidoran’s forehead contains a powerful poison. This is a very cautious Pokémon, always straining its large ears.

english name is Nidorino. primary type is poison. abilities 0 is Poison Point. abilities 1 is Rivalry. classification is Poison Pin Pokémon. description is With a horn that’s harder than diamond, this Pokémon goes around shattering boulders as it searches for a moon stone.

english name is Nidoking. primary type is poison. secondary type is ground. abilities 0 is Poison Point. abilities 1 is Rivalry. classification is Drill Pokémon. description is When it goes on a rampage, it’s impossible to control. But in the presence of a Nidoqueen it’s lived with for a long time, Nidoking calms down.

english name is Clefairy. primary type is fairy. abilities 0 is Cute Charm. abilities 1 is Magic Guard. classification is Fairy Pokémon. description is It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.

english name is Clefable. primary type is fairy. abilities 0 is Cute Charm. abilities 1 is Magic Guard. classification is Fairy Pokémon. description is A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.

english name is Vulpix. primary type is fire. secondary type is ice. abilities 0 is Flash Fire. classification is Fox Pokémon. description is While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted.

english name is Ninetales. primary type is fire. secondary type is ice. abilities 0 is Flash Fire. classification is Fox Pokémon. description is It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.

english name is Jigglypuff. primary type is normal. secondary type is fairy. abilities 0 is Cute Charm. abilities 1 is Competitive. classification is Balloon Pokémon. description is Jigglypuff has top-notch lung capacity, even by comparison to other Pokémon. It won’t stop singing its lullabies until its foes fall asleep.

english name is Wigglytuff. primary type is normal. secondary type is fairy. abilities 0 is Cute Charm. abilities 1 is Competitive. classification is Balloon Pokémon. description is The more air it takes in, the more it inflates. If opponents catch it in a bad mood, it will inflate itself to an enormous size to intimidate them.

english name is Zubat. primary type is poison. secondary type is flying. abilities 0 is Inner Focus. classification is Bat Pokémon. description is It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings. Even in tight caves, Zubat flies around with skill.

english name is Golbat. primary type is poison. secondary type is flying. abilities 0 is Inner Focus. classification is Bat Pokémon. description is It loves to drink other creatures’ blood. It’s said that if it finds others of its kind going hungry, it sometimes shares the blood it’s gathered.

english name is Oddish. primary type is grass. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Chlorophyll. classification is Weed Pokémon. description is If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move. It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.

english name is Gloom. primary type is grass. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Chlorophyll. classification is Weed Pokémon. description is Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles.

english name is Vileplume. primary type is grass. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Chlorophyll. classification is Flower Pokémon. description is It has the world’s largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

english name is Paras. primary type is bug. secondary type is grass. abilities 0 is Effect Spore. abilities 1 is Dry Skin. classification is Mushroom Pokémon. description is Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.

english name is Parasect. primary type is bug. secondary type is grass. abilities 0 is Effect Spore. abilities 1 is Dry Skin. classification is Mushroom Pokémon. description is The bug host is drained of energy by the mushroom on its back. The mushroom appears to do all the thinking.

english name is Venonat. primary type is bug. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Compound Eyes. abilities 1 is Tinted Lens. classification is Insect Pokémon. description is Its large eyes act as radar. In a bright place, you can see that they are clusters of many tiny eyes.

english name is Venomoth. primary type is bug. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Shield Dust. abilities 1 is Tinted Lens. classification is Poison Moth Pokémon. description is The powdery scales on its wings are hard to remove from skin. They also contain poison that leaks out on contact.

english name is Diglett. primary type is ground. secondary type is ground. abilities 0 is Sand Veil. abilities 1 is Arena Trap. classification is Mole Pokémon. description is If a Diglett digs through a field, it leaves the soil perfectly tilled and ideal for planting crops.

english name is Dugtrio. primary type is ground. secondary type is ground. abilities 0 is Sand Veil. abilities 1 is Arena Trap. classification is Mole Pokémon. description is A team of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

english name is Meowth. primary type is normal. secondary type is dark. abilities 0 is Pickup. abilities 1 is Technician. classification is Scratch Cat Pokémon. description is It loves to collect shiny things. If it’s in a good mood, it might even let its Trainer have a look at its hoard of treasures.

english name is Persian. primary type is normal. secondary type is dark. abilities 0 is Limber. abilities 1 is Technician. classification is Classy Cat Pokémon. description is Getting this prideful Pokémon to warm up to you takes a lot of effort, and it will claw at you the moment it gets annoyed.

english name is Psyduck. primary type is water. abilities 0 is Damp. abilities 1 is Cloud Nine. classification is Duck Pokémon. description is Psyduck is constantly beset by headaches. If the Pokémon lets its strange power erupt, apparently the pain subsides for a while.

english name is Golduck. primary type is water. abilities 0 is Damp. abilities 1 is Cloud Nine. classification is Duck Pokémon. description is This Pokémon lives in gently flowing rivers. It paddles through the water with its long limbs, putting its graceful swimming skills on display.

english name is Mankey. primary type is fighting. abilities 0 is Vital Spirit. abilities 1 is Anger Point. classification is Pig Monkey Pokémon. description is An agile Pokémon that lives in trees. It angers easily and will not hesitate to attack anything.

english name is Primeape. primary type is fighting. abilities 0 is Vital Spirit. abilities 1 is Anger Point. classification is Pig Monkey Pokémon. description is It stops being angry only when nobody else is around. To view this moment is very difficult.

english name is Growlithe. primary type is fire. abilities 0 is Intimidate. abilities 1 is Flash Fire. classification is Puppy Pokémon. description is It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.

english name is Arcanine. primary type is fire. abilities 0 is Intimidate. abilities 1 is Flash Fire. classification is Legendary Pokémon. description is The sight of it running over 6,200 miles in a single day and night has captivated many people.

english name is Poliwag. primary type is water. abilities 0 is Water Absorb. abilities 1 is Damp. classification is Tadpole Pokémon. description is For Poliwag, swimming is easier than walking. The swirl pattern on its belly is actually part of the Pokémon’s innards showing through the skin.

english name is Poliwhirl. primary type is water. abilities 0 is Water Absorb. abilities 1 is Damp. classification is Tadpole Pokémon. description is Staring at the swirl on its belly causes drowsiness. This trait of Poliwhirl’s has been used in place of lullabies to get children to go to sleep.

english name is Poliwrath. primary type is water. secondary type is fighting. abilities 0 is Water Absorb. abilities 1 is Damp. classification is Tadpole Pokémon. description is Its body is solid muscle. When swimming through cold seas, Poliwrath uses its impressive arms to smash through drift ice and plow forward.

english name is Abra. primary type is psychic. abilities 0 is Synchronize. abilities 1 is Inner Focus. classification is Psi Pokémon. description is This Pokémon uses its psychic powers while it sleeps. The contents of Abra’s dreams affect the powers that the Pokémon wields.

english name is Kadabra. primary type is psychic. abilities 0 is Synchronize. abilities 1 is Inner Focus. classification is Psi Pokémon. description is Using its psychic power, Kadabra levitates as it sleeps. It uses its springy tail as a pillow.

english name is Alakazam. primary type is psychic. abilities 0 is Synchronize. abilities 1 is Inner Focus. classification is Psi Pokémon. description is It has an incredibly high level of intelligence. Some say that Alakazam remembers everything that ever happens to it, from birth till death.

english name is Machop. primary type is fighting. abilities 0 is Guts. abilities 1 is No Guard. classification is Superpower Pokémon. description is Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it’s the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.

english name is Machoke. primary type is fighting. abilities 0 is Guts. abilities 1 is No Guard. classification is Superpower Pokémon. description is Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

english name is Machamp. primary type is fighting. abilities 0 is Guts. abilities 1 is No Guard. classification is Superpower Pokémon. description is It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.

english name is Bellsprout. primary type is grass. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Chlorophyll. classification is Flower Pokémon. description is Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny bugs with its vines and devours them.

english name is Weepinbell. primary type is grass. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Chlorophyll. classification is Flycatcher Pokémon. description is When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is dissolved by strong acids.

english name is Victreebel. primary type is grass. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Chlorophyll. classification is Flycatcher Pokémon. description is Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is dissolved in a day, bones and all.

english name is Tentacool. primary type is water. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Clear Body. abilities 1 is Liquid Ooze. classification is Jellyfish Pokémon. description is Tentacool is not a particularly strong swimmer. It drifts across the surface of shallow seas as it searches for prey.

english name is Tentacruel. primary type is water. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Clear Body. abilities 1 is Liquid Ooze. classification is Jellyfish Pokémon. description is When the red orbs on Tentacruel’s head glow brightly, watch out. The Pokémon is about to fire off a burst of ultrasonic waves.

english name is Geodude. primary type is rock. secondary type is ground. abilities 0 is Rock Head. abilities 1 is Sturdy. classification is Rock Pokémon. description is Commonly found near mountain trails and the like. If you step on one by accident, it gets angry.

english name is Graveler. primary type is rock. secondary type is ground. abilities 0 is Rock Head. abilities 1 is Sturdy. classification is Rock Pokémon. description is Often seen rolling down mountain trails. Obstacles are just things to roll straight over, not avoid.

english name is Golem. primary type is rock. secondary type is ground. abilities 0 is Rock Head. abilities 1 is Sturdy. classification is Megaton Pokémon. description is Once it sheds its skin, its body turns tender and whitish. Its hide hardens when it’s exposed to air.

english name is Ponyta. primary type is fire. secondary type is psychic. abilities 0 is Run Away. abilities 1 is Flash Fire. classification is Fire Horse Pokémon. description is It can’t run properly when it’s newly born. As it races around with others of its kind, its legs grow stronger.

english name is Rapidash. primary type is fire. secondary type is psychic. abilities 0 is Run Away. abilities 1 is Flash Fire. classification is Fire Horse Pokémon. description is This Pokémon can be seen galloping through fields at speeds of up to 150 mph, its fiery mane fluttering in the wind.

english name is Slowpoke. primary type is water. secondary type is psychic. abilities 0 is Oblivious. abilities 1 is Own Tempo. classification is Dopey Pokémon. description is Slow-witted and oblivious, this Pokémon won’t feel any pain if its tail gets eaten. It won’t notice when its tail grows back, either.

english name is Slowbro. primary type is water. secondary type is psychic. abilities 0 is Oblivious. abilities 1 is Own Tempo. classification is Hermit Crab Pokémon. description is Slowpoke became Slowbro when a Shellder bit on to its tail. Sweet flavors seeping from the tail make the Shellder feel as if its life is a dream.

english name is Magnemite. primary type is electric. secondary type is steel. abilities 0 is Magnet Pull. abilities 1 is Sturdy. classification is Magnet Pokémon. description is At times, Magnemite runs out of electricity and ends up on the ground. If you give batteries to a grounded Magnemite, it’ll start moving again.

english name is Magneton. primary type is electric. secondary type is steel. abilities 0 is Magnet Pull. abilities 1 is Sturdy. classification is Magnet Pokémon. description is This Pokémon is three Magnemite that have linked together. Magneton sends out powerful radio waves to study its surroundings.

english name is Farfetch'd. primary type is normal. secondary type is flying. abilities 0 is Keen Eye. abilities 1 is Inner Focus. classification is Wild Duck Pokémon. description is The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wings serves as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire situation, the stalk can also serve as food.

english name is Doduo. primary type is normal. secondary type is flying. abilities 0 is Run Away. abilities 1 is Early Bird. classification is Twin Bird Pokémon. description is Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this Pokémon runs at high speed on developed legs.

english name is Dodrio. primary type is normal. secondary type is flying. abilities 0 is Run Away. abilities 1 is Early Bird. classification is Triple Bird Pokémon. description is One of Doduo’s two heads splits to form a unique species. It runs close to 40 mph in prairies.

english name is Seel. primary type is water. abilities 0 is Thick Fat. abilities 1 is Hydration. classification is Sea Lion Pokémon. description is Loves freezing-cold conditions. Relishes swimming in a frigid climate of around 14 degrees Fahrenheit.

english name is Dewgong. primary type is water. secondary type is ice. abilities 0 is Thick Fat. abilities 1 is Hydration. classification is Sea Lion Pokémon. description is Its entire body is a snowy white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.

english name is Grimer. primary type is poison. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Stench. abilities 1 is Sticky Hold. classification is Sludge Pokémon. description is Made of congealed sludge. It smells too putrid to touch. Even weeds won’t grow in its path.

english name is Muk. primary type is poison. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Stench. abilities 1 is Sticky Hold. classification is Sludge Pokémon. description is Smells so awful, it can cause fainting. Through degeneration of its nose, it lost its sense of smell.

english name is Shellder. primary type is water. abilities 0 is Shell Armor. abilities 1 is Skill Link. classification is Bivalve Pokémon. description is It swims facing backward by opening and closing its two-piece shell. It is surprisingly fast.

english name is Cloyster. primary type is water. secondary type is ice. abilities 0 is Shell Armor. abilities 1 is Skill Link. classification is Bivalve Pokémon. description is Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered, even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it is attacking.

english name is Gastly. primary type is ghost. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Levitate. classification is Gas Pokémon. description is Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.

english name is Haunter. primary type is ghost. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Levitate. classification is Gas Pokémon. description is Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death eventually comes.

english name is Gengar. primary type is ghost. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Cursed Body. classification is Shadow Pokémon. description is On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be Gengar’s doing.

english name is Onix. primary type is rock. secondary type is ground. abilities 0 is Rock Head. abilities 1 is Sturdy. classification is Rock Snake Pokémon. description is As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.

english name is Drowzee. primary type is psychic. abilities 0 is Insomnia. abilities 1 is Forewarn. classification is Hypnosis Pokémon. description is If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes show you dreams it had eaten in the past.

english name is Hypno. primary type is psychic. abilities 0 is Insomnia. abilities 1 is Forewarn. classification is Hypnosis Pokémon. description is Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.

english name is Krabby. primary type is water. abilities 0 is Hyper Cutter. abilities 1 is Shell Armor. classification is River Crab Pokémon. description is It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.

english name is Kingler. primary type is water. abilities 0 is Hyper Cutter. abilities 1 is Shell Armor. classification is Pincer Pokémon. description is Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.

english name is Voltorb. primary type is electric. abilities 0 is Soundproof. abilities 1 is Static. classification is Ball Pokémon. description is It is said to camouflage itself as a Poké Ball. It will self-destruct with very little stimulus.

english name is Electrode. primary type is electric. abilities 0 is Soundproof. abilities 1 is Static. classification is Ball Pokémon. description is Stores electrical energy inside its body. Even the slightest shock could trigger a huge explosion.

english name is Exeggcute. primary type is grass. secondary type is psychic. abilities 0 is Chlorophyll. classification is Egg Pokémon. description is Though it may look like it’s just a bunch of eggs, it’s a proper Pokémon. Exeggcute communicates with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.

english name is Exeggutor. primary type is grass. secondary type is psychic. abilities 0 is Chlorophyll. classification is Coconut Pokémon. description is Each of Exeggutor’s three heads is thinking different thoughts. The three don’t seem to be very interested in one another.

english name is Cubone. primary type is ground. abilities 0 is Rock Head. abilities 1 is Lightning Rod. classification is Lonely Pokémon. description is When the memory of its departed mother brings it to tears, its cries echo mournfully within the skull it wears on its head.

english name is Marowak. primary type is ground. secondary type is fire. abilities 0 is Rock Head. abilities 1 is Lightning Rod. classification is Bone Keeper Pokémon. description is This Pokémon overcame its sorrow to evolve a sturdy new body. Marowak faces its opponents bravely, using a bone as a weapon.

english name is Hitmonlee. primary type is fighting. abilities 0 is Limber. abilities 1 is Reckless. classification is Kicking Pokémon. description is This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.

english name is Hitmonchan. primary type is fighting. abilities 0 is Keen Eye. abilities 1 is Iron Fist. classification is Punching Pokémon. description is Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.

english name is Lickitung. primary type is normal. abilities 0 is Own Tempo. abilities 1 is Oblivious. classification is Licking Pokémon. description is If this Pokémon’s sticky saliva gets on you and you don’t clean it off, an intense itch will set in. The itch won’t go away, either.

english name is Koffing. primary type is poison. abilities 0 is Levitate. abilities 1 is Neutralizing Gas. classification is Poison Gas Pokémon. description is Its body is full of poisonous gas. It floats into garbage dumps, seeking out the fumes of raw, rotting trash.

english name is Weezing. primary type is poison. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Levitate. abilities 1 is Neutralizing Gas. classification is Poison Gas Pokémon. description is It mixes gases between its two bodies. It’s said that these Pokémon were seen all over the Galar region back in the day.

english name is Rhyhorn. primary type is ground. secondary type is rock. abilities 0 is Lightning Rod. abilities 1 is Rock Head. classification is Spikes Pokémon. description is Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging tackles.

english name is Rhydon. primary type is ground. secondary type is rock. abilities 0 is Lightning Rod. abilities 1 is Rock Head. classification is Drill Pokémon. description is It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.

english name is Chansey. primary type is normal. abilities 0 is Natural Cure. abilities 1 is Serene Grace. classification is Egg Pokémon. description is The egg Chansey carries is not only delicious but also packed with nutrition. It’s used as a high-class cooking ingredient.

english name is Tangela. primary type is grass. abilities 0 is Chlorophyll. abilities 1 is Leaf Guard. classification is Vine Pokémon. description is Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that grows nonstop even if the vines are torn off, this Pokémon’s true appearance remains a mystery.

english name is Kangaskhan. primary type is normal. abilities 0 is Early Bird. abilities 1 is Scrappy. classification is Parent Pokémon. description is Although it’s carrying its baby in a pouch on its belly, Kangaskhan is swift on its feet. It intimidates its opponents with quick jabs.

english name is Horsea. primary type is water. abilities 0 is Swift Swim. abilities 1 is Sniper. classification is Dragon Pokémon. description is Horsea makes its home in oceans with gentle currents. If this Pokémon is under attack, it spits out pitch-black ink and escapes.

english name is Seadra. primary type is water. abilities 0 is Poison Point. abilities 1 is Sniper. classification is Dragon Pokémon. description is It’s the males that raise the offspring. While Seadra are raising young, the spines on their backs secrete thicker and stronger poison.

english name is Goldeen. primary type is water. abilities 0 is Swift Swim. abilities 1 is Water Veil. classification is Goldfish Pokémon. description is Its dorsal, pectoral, and tail fins wave elegantly in water. That is why it is known as the Water Dancer.

english name is Seaking. primary type is water. abilities 0 is Swift Swim. abilities 1 is Water Veil. classification is Goldfish Pokémon. description is In autumn, its body becomes more fatty in preparing to propose to a mate. It takes on beautiful colors.

english name is Staryu. primary type is water. abilities 0 is Illuminate. abilities 1 is Natural Cure. classification is Starshape Pokémon. description is If you visit a beach at the end of summer, you’ll be able to see groups of Staryu lighting up in a steady rhythm.

english name is Starmie. primary type is water. secondary type is psychic. abilities 0 is Illuminate. abilities 1 is Natural Cure. classification is Mysterious Pokémon. description is This Pokémon has an organ known as its core. The organ glows in seven colors when Starmie is unleashing its potent psychic powers.

english name is Mr. Mime. primary type is psychic. secondary type is fairy. abilities 0 is Soundproof. abilities 1 is Filter. classification is Barrier Pokémon. description is The broadness of its hands may be no coincidence—many scientists believe its palms became enlarged specifically for pantomiming.

english name is Scyther. primary type is bug. secondary type is flying. abilities 0 is Swarm. abilities 1 is Technician. classification is Mantis Pokémon. description is As Scyther fights more and more battles, its scythes become sharper and sharper. With a single slice, Scyther can fell a massive tree.

english name is Jynx. primary type is ice. secondary type is psychic. abilities 0 is Oblivious. abilities 1 is Forewarn. classification is Humanshape Pokémon. description is In certain parts of Galar, Jynx was once feared and worshiped as the Queen of Ice.

english name is Electabuzz. primary type is electric. abilities 0 is Static. classification is Electric Pokémon. description is Many power plants keep Ground-type Pokémon around as a defense against Electabuzz that come seeking electricity.

english name is Magmar. primary type is fire. abilities 0 is Flame Body. classification is Spitfire Pokémon. description is Magmar dispatches its prey with fire. But it regrets this habit once it realizes that it has burned its intended prey to a charred crisp.

english name is Pinsir. primary type is bug. abilities 0 is Hyper Cutter. abilities 1 is Mold Breaker. classification is Stagbeetle Pokémon. description is These Pokémon judge one another based on pincers. Thicker, more impressive pincers make for more popularity with the opposite gender.

english name is Liepard. primary type is dark. abilities 0 is Limber. abilities 1 is Unburden. classification is Cruel Pokémon. description is Don’t be fooled by its gorgeous fur and elegant figure. This is a moody and vicious Pokémon.

english name is Musharna. primary type is psychic. abilities 0 is Forewarn. abilities 1 is Synchronize. classification is Drowsing Pokémon. description is When dark mists emanate from its body, don’t get too near. If you do, your nightmares will become reality.

If you’re scattering food for them, be careful—several hundred of them can gather at once.

No matter how far it travels, it can always find its way back to its master and its nest.

The females are known for their stamina, while the males outclass them in terms of speed.

english name is Drilbur. primary type is ground. abilities 0 is Sand Rush. abilities 1 is Sand Force. classification is Mole Pokémon. description is It brings its claws together and whirls around at high speed before rushing toward its prey.

english name is Excadrill. primary type is ground. secondary type is steel. abilities 0 is Sand Rush. abilities 1 is Sand Force. classification is Subterrene Pokémon. description is It’s not uncommon for tunnels that appear to have formed naturally to actually be a result of Excadrill’s rampant digging.

english name is Audino. primary type is normal. abilities 0 is Healer. abilities 1 is Regenerator. classification is Hearing Pokémon. description is Audino’s sense of hearing is superb. Not even a pebble rolling along over a mile away will escape Audino’s ears.

english name is Timburr. primary type is fighting. abilities 0 is Guts. abilities 1 is Sheer Force. classification is Muscular Pokémon. description is It loves helping out with construction projects. It loves it so much that if rain causes work to halt, it swings its log around and throws a tantrum.

english name is Gurdurr. primary type is fighting. abilities 0 is Guts. abilities 1 is Sheer Force. classification is Muscular Pokémon. description is It shows off its muscles to Machoke and other Gurdurr. If it fails to measure up to the other Pokémon, it lies low for a little while.

english name is Palpitoad. primary type is water. secondary type is ground. abilities 0 is Swift Swim. abilities 1 is Hydration. classification is Vibration Pokémon. description is It weakens its prey with sound waves intense enough to cause headaches, then entangles them with its sticky tongue.

english name is Seismitoad. primary type is water. secondary type is ground. abilities 0 is Swift Swim. abilities 1 is Poison Touch. classification is Vibration Pokémon. description is The vibrating of the bumps all over its body causes earthquake-like tremors. Seismitoad and Croagunk are similar species.

english name is Sawk. primary type is fighting. abilities 0 is Sturdy. abilities 1 is Inner Focus. classification is Karate Pokémon. description is If you see a Sawk training in the mountains in its single-minded pursuit of strength, it’s best to quietly pass by.

english name is Sewaddle. primary type is bug. secondary type is grass. abilities 0 is Swarm. abilities 1 is Chlorophyll. classification is Sewing Pokémon. description is This Pokémon makes clothes for itself. It chews up leaves and sews them with sticky thread extruded from its mouth.

english name is Scolipede. primary type is bug. secondary type is poison. abilities 0 is Poison Point. abilities 1 is Swarm. classification is Megapede Pokémon. description is Scolipede latches on to its prey with the claws on its neck before slamming them into the ground and jabbing them with its claws’ toxic spikes.

If it gets caught up in hurricane-strength winds, it can get sent to the other side of the Earth.

english name is Whimsicott. primary type is grass. secondary type is fairy. abilities 0 is Prankster. abilities 1 is Infiltrator. classification is Windveiled Pokémon. description is It scatters cotton all over the place as a prank. If it gets wet, it’ll become too heavy to move and have no choice but to answer for its mischief.

english name is Petilil. primary type is grass. abilities 0 is Chlorophyll. abilities 1 is Own Tempo. classification is Bulb Pokémon. description is Petilil appears around sources of clean water. Boiling leaves from this Pokémon’s head results in a liquid that’s sometimes used as a bug repellent.

english name is Lilligant. primary type is grass. abilities 0 is Chlorophyll. abilities 1 is Own Tempo. classification is Flowering Pokémon. description is It’s believed that even first-rate gardeners have a hard time getting the flower on a Lilligant’s head to bloom.

english name is Basculin. primary type is water. abilities 0 is Reckless (Red-Striped Form). abilities 1 is Rock Head (Blue-Striped Form). classification is Hostile Pokémon. description is Anglers love the fight this Pokémon puts up on the hook. And there are always more to catch— many people release them into lakes illicitly.

english name is Sandile. primary type is ground. secondary type is dark. abilities 0 is Intimidate. abilities 1 is Moxie. classification is Desert Croc Pokémon. description is The desert gets cold at night, so when the sun sets, this Pokémon burrows deep into the sand and sleeps until sunrise.

english name is Krokorok. primary type is ground. secondary type is dark. abilities 0 is Intimidate. abilities 1 is Moxie. classification is Desert Croc Pokémon. description is Krokorok has specialized eyes that enable it to see in the dark. This ability lets Krokorok hunt in the dead of night without getting lost.

english name is Krookodile. primary type is ground. secondary type is dark. abilities 0 is Intimidate. abilities 1 is Moxie. classification is Intimidation Pokémon. description is This Pokémon is known as the Bully of the Sands. Krookodile’s mighty jaws can bite through heavy plates of iron with almost no effort at all.

english name is Darumaka. primary type is fire. secondary type is ice. abilities 0 is Hustle. classification is Zen Charm Pokémon. description is It derives its power from fire burning inside its body. If the fire dwindles, this Pokémon will immediately fall asleep.

english name is Darmanitan. primary type is fire. secondary type is fire. abilities 0 is Sheer Force. classification is Blazing Pokémon. description is The thick arms of this hot-blooded Pokémon can deliver punches capable of obliterating a dump truck.

english name is Maractus. primary type is grass. abilities 0 is Water Absorb. abilities 1 is Chlorophyll. classification is Cactus Pokémon. description is With noises that could be mistaken for the rattles of maracas, it creates an upbeat rhythm, startling bird Pokémon and making them fly off in a hurry.

english name is Dwebble. primary type is bug. secondary type is rock. abilities 0 is Sturdy. abilities 1 is Shell Armor. classification is Rock Inn Pokémon. description is When it finds a stone appealing, it creates a hole inside it and uses it as its home. This Pokémon is the natural enemy of Roggenrola and Rolycoly.

english name is Sigilyph. primary type is psychic. secondary type is flying. abilities 0 is Wonder Skin . abilities 1 is Magic Guard. classification is Avianoid Pokémon. description is Psychic power allows these Pokémon to fly. Some say they were the guardians of an ancient city. Others say they were the guardians’ emissaries.

english name is Cofagrigus. primary type is ghost. abilities 0 is Mummy. classification is Coffin Pokémon. description is This Pokémon has a body of sparkling gold. People say it no longer remembers that it was once human.

english name is Tirtouga. primary type is water. secondary type is rock. abilities 0 is Solid Rock. abilities 1 is Sturdy. classification is Prototurtle Pokémon. description is This Pokémon inhabited ancient seas. Although it can only crawl, it still comes up onto land in search of prey.

Because of this, Carracosta’s own shell grows thick and sturdy.

english name is Archen. primary type is rock. secondary type is flying. abilities 0 is Defeatist. classification is First Bird Pokémon. description is This Pokémon was successfully restored from a fossil. As research suggested, Archen is unable to fly. But it’s very good at jumping.

english name is Archeops. primary type is rock. secondary type is flying. abilities 0 is Defeatist. classification is First Bird Pokémon. description is It needs a running start to take off. If Archeops wants to fly, it first needs to run nearly 25 mph, building speed over a course of about 2.5 miles.

english name is Trubbish. primary type is poison. abilities 0 is Stench. abilities 1 is Sticky Hold. classification is Trash Bag Pokémon. description is Its favorite places are unsanitary ones. If you leave trash lying around, you could even find one of these Pokémon living in your room.

english name is Zoroark. primary type is dark. abilities 0 is Illusion. classification is Illusion Fox Pokémon. description is This Pokémon cares deeply about others of its kind, and it will conjure terrifying illusions to keep its den and pack safe.

english name is Minccino. primary type is normal. abilities 0 is Cute Charm. abilities 1 is Technician. classification is Chinchilla Pokémon. description is The way it brushes away grime with its tail can be helpful when cleaning. But its focus on spotlessness can make cleaning more of a hassle.

english name is Cinccino. primary type is normal. abilities 0 is Cute Charm. abilities 1 is Technician. classification is Scarf Pokémon. description is Its body secretes oil that this Pokémon spreads over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust. Cinccino won’t tolerate even a speck of the stuff.

english name is Gothitelle. primary type is psychic. abilities 0 is Frisk. abilities 1 is Competitive. classification is Astral Body Pokémon. description is It has tremendous psychic power, but it dislikes conflict. It’s also able to predict the future based on the movement of the stars.

english name is Duosion. primary type is psychic. abilities 0 is Overcoat. abilities 1 is Magic Guard. classification is Mitosis Pokémon. description is Its psychic power can supposedly cover a range of more than half a mile—but only if its two brains can agree with each other.

english name is Reuniclus. primary type is psychic. abilities 0 is Overcoat. abilities 1 is Magic Guard. classification is Multiplying Pokémon. description is While it could use its psychic abilities in battle, this Pokémon prefers to swing its powerful arms around to beat opponents into submission.

english name is Ducklett. primary type is water. secondary type is flying. abilities 0 is Keen Eye. abilities 1 is Big Pecks. classification is Water Bird Pokémon. description is When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.

english name is Swanna. primary type is water. secondary type is flying. abilities 0 is Keen Eye. abilities 1 is Big Pecks. classification is White Bird Pokémon. description is Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.

english name is Deerling. primary type is normal. secondary type is grass. abilities 0 is Chlorophyll. abilities 1 is Sap Sipper. classification is Season Pokémon. description is Their coloring changes according to the seasons and can be slightly affected by the temperature and humidity as well.

english name is Escavalier. primary type is bug. secondary type is steel. abilities 0 is Swarm. abilities 1 is Shell Armor. classification is Cavalry Pokémon. description is They use shells they’ve stolen from Shelmet to arm and protect themselves. They’re very popular Pokémon in the Galar region.

english name is Alomomola. primary type is water. abilities 0 is Healer. abilities 1 is Hydration. classification is Caring Pokémon. description is Fishermen take them along on long voyages, because if you have an Alomomola with you, there’ll be no need for a doctor or medicine.

It’s soaking up static electricity because it can’t produce a charge on its own.

english name is Galvantula. primary type is bug. secondary type is electric. abilities 0 is Compoundeyes. abilities 1 is Unnerve. classification is EleSpider Pokémon. description is It launches electrified fur from its abdomen as its means of attack. Opponents hit by the fur could be in for three full days and nights of paralysis.

english name is Klang. primary type is steel. abilities 0 is Plus. abilities 1 is Minus. classification is Gear Pokémon. description is When Klang goes all out, the minigear links up perfectly with the outer part of the big gear, and this Pokémon’s rotation speed increases sharply.

english name is Tynamo. primary type is electric. abilities 0 is Levitate. classification is EleFish Pokémon. description is While one alone doesn’t have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.

english name is Eelektrik. primary type is electric. abilities 0 is Levitate. classification is EleFish Pokémon. description is It wraps itself around its prey and paralyzes it with electricity from the round spots on its sides. Then it chomps.

english name is Elgyem. primary type is psychic. abilities 0 is Telepathy. abilities 1 is Synchronize. classification is Cerebral Pokémon. description is If this Pokémon stands near a TV, strange scenery will appear on the screen. That scenery is said to be from its home.

english name is Beheeyem. primary type is psychic. abilities 0 is Telepathy. abilities 1 is Synchronize. classification is Cerebral Pokémon. description is Whenever a Beheeyem visits a farm, a Dubwool mysteriously disappears.

english name is Litwick. primary type is ghost. secondary type is fire. abilities 0 is Flash Fire. abilities 1 is Flame Body. classification is Candle Pokémon. description is The flame on its head keeps its body slightly warm. This Pokémon takes lost children by the hand to guide them to the spirit world.

english name is Lampent. primary type is ghost. secondary type is fire. abilities 0 is Flash Fire. abilities 1 is Flame Body. classification is Lamp Pokémon. description is This Pokémon appears just before someone passes away, so it’s feared as an emissary of death.

english name is Chandelure. primary type is ghost. secondary type is fire. abilities 0 is Flash Fire. abilities 1 is Flame Body. classification is Luring Pokémon. description is This Pokémon haunts dilapidated mansions. It sways its arms to hypnotize opponents with the ominous dancing of its flames.

english name is Shelmet. primary type is bug. abilities 0 is Hydration. abilities 1 is Shell Armor. classification is Snail Pokémon. description is When attacked, it tightly shuts the lid of its shell. This reaction fails to protect it from Karrablast, however, because they can still get into the shell.

english name is Mienfoo. primary type is fighting. abilities 0 is Inner Focus. abilities 1 is Regenerator. classification is Martial Arts Pokémon. description is In one minute, a well-trained Mienfoo can chop with its arms more than 100 times.

english name is Golurk. primary type is ground. secondary type is ghost. abilities 0 is Iron Fist. abilities 1 is Klutz. classification is Automaton Pokémon. description is Artillery platforms built into the walls of ancient castles served as perches from which Golurk could fire energy beams.

english name is Pawniard. primary type is dark. secondary type is steel. abilities 0 is Defiant. abilities 1 is Inner Focus. classification is Sharp Blade Pokémon. description is It uses river stones to maintain the cutting edges of the blades covering its body. These sharpened blades allow it to bring down opponents.
